code: import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartPage=()=>{const{cartItems,updateQuantity,removeFromCart}=useCart();const totalPrice=cartItems.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.price*item.quantity,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-page-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your Cart"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"cart-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Remove"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"1",value:item.quantity,onChange:e=>updateQuantity(item.id,parseInt(e.target.value)),className:"quantity-input"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",item.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",(item.price*item.quantity).toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),className:"btn-remove",children:"Remove"})})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tfoot",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"3",className:"total-label",children:"Total:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"total-amount",children:["$",totalPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{})]})})]})]});};export default CartPage;
